response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both you and us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose an offer of $7,200 for this product. This price not only allows us to maintain a fair profit margin but also ensures that you receive a high-quality item at a competitive cost. I believe this deal presents a great opportunity for both parties. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 7200}
